title: ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
description: The bug report states that when using the 'outjar' option with ajc, the resulting file should be a valid jar file. However, the file is not considered a valid jar file because it does not contain a MANIFEST.MF file. The user provides the steps to reproduce the issue as follows:
OB: When I call 'ajc sourceroots <mydir> outjar <my.jar>', an output file is created with a '.jar' extension.
EB: When I call 'ajc sourceroots <mydir> outjar <my.jar>', the resulting file should be a valid jar file with a MANIFEST.MF file included.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Run 'ajc sourceroots <mydir> outjar <my.jar>'.
2. Check the resulting <my.jar> file and observe that there is no MANIFEST.MF file included.
